overview: From 2026-01-06 to 2026-01-07, elizaos/docs had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 1 active contributors.

topIssues.title: docs: Add guide for configuring agent memory (knowledge & lore sections)
topIssues.author: madjin
topIssues.body:
## Context
Users struggle with agent memory/recall configuration. Need clearer guidance on "knowledge" and "lore" sections in agent JSON.

- **Source**: Discord discussion (2026-01-03)
- **Priority**: P2 (from issue-triage assessment)
- **Impact**: High (recurring onboarding pain; "memory doesn't work" complaints)

## Evidence
- Discord: Users asking "How should knowledge and lore sections be added to JSON configurations?"
- Open question in daily facts: "How should knowledge and lore sections be added to JSON configurations to improve agent memory/recall?"
- Pattern: Configuration discoverability problems across multiple reports

## Technical Details
- **Component**: Docs + Agent configuration schema
- **Complexity**: 2/5 (primarily documentation work)
- **Required Expertise**: Agent config schema, technical writing, examples

## Proposed Implementation
1. Create docs page: "Configuring Agent Memory: Knowledge & Lore Guide"
2. Include working JSON examples for both `knowledge` and `lore` sections
3. Explain the difference between knowledge (factual) and lore (personality/backstory)
4. Add schema validation guidance (what's required vs optional)
5. Include troubleshooting section for common memory issues

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Documentation page exists with clear examples
- [ ] Both knowledge and lore sections covered
- [ ] At least one working agent template with memory configured
- [ ] FAQ/troubleshooting section included

---
Generated from [elizaOS intelligence pipeline](https://github.com/elizaOS/knowledge)
